name: TOOR
description:
The story takes place in a technologically advanced future, where people can use mechanical prosthetic bodies to replace their original bodies to make themselves indestructible and omnipotent. But the price of this is that it will increase the load on the brain, and you might lose consciousness...

The flesh and blood are weak, and the machinery soars.

The game was produced by five college students during the 2023 Global Game Jam. If you get stuck while playing the game, there is a small reminder on the last page of "README" in the compressed package! For the best gaming experience, please make sure to read the tips after you get stuck! The game time is about half an hour.

故事发生在科技高度发达的未来，人们可以用机械义体代替自己本来的肉体来让自己变得坚不可摧，无所不能。但这样的代价就是会增加大脑的负荷，搞不好会丧失自己的意识...

血肉苦弱，机械飞升。

这款游戏在2023年Global Game Jam期间由五名大学生一起制作。如果你在玩游戏的时候卡关了，压缩包里的《README》中最后一页有小提示！为了最好的游戏体验，请确定在你卡关之后再去看小提示！游戏时长约为半小时。
